articles.title: Thousands march on Washington DC to demand changes to US gun laws - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: The call for changes to the law in America follow recent massacres in Uvalde, Texas, and Buffalo, New York state.
articles.content:
THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE streamed to the US National Mall in Washington DC today as part of country-wide demonstrations to demand greater gun control.

articles.title: Canada commits $27M on easing migration pressures at Summit of the Americas - CBC News
articles.description: Leaders from across the Americas, including Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, signed on Friday to what U.S. President Joe Biden called a "historic commitment" to ease the pressure of northward migration.
